Windows

What it is

Panels that are floatable, draggable, resizable

Specs

CSS Class: .x-window

Ext.window.Window

Extends from Ext.panel.Panel

  • Window Header (x-window-header)

    • title

    • glyph

    • tools

  • Window Body (x-window-body)

    • icon

    • height

    • width

    • minWidth

    • maxWidth

    • x

    • y

    • +modal*

    • draggable

    • resizable

Example

Ext.create('Ext.window.Window', {
    title: 'Window',
    autoShow: 'true',
    height: 300,
    width: 300,
    x: 10,
    y: 10
});
